stanza.line: My love is strengthened though more weak in seeming
I love not less though less the show appear
That love is merchandized whose rich esteeming
The owner tongue doth publish every where
Our love was new and then but in thespring
When I was wont to greet it with mylays
As Philomel in summer front dothsing
And stops her pipe in growth of riperdays
Not that the summer is less pleasantnow
Than when her mournful hymns did hush thenight
But that wild music burthens everybough
And sweets grown common lose their deardelight
Therefore like her I sometime hold my tongue
Because I would not dull you with my song
